177a5(mdo sde): gzi brjid phreng ldan zhes bya ba dang /dpal 'dzin ces bya ba dang /mdog sngon zhes bya ba dang /mi 'chi zhes bya ba dang /mi 'gyur zhes bya ba dang /bde byed ces bya ba dang /
177a6(mdo sde): mchog sbyin 'dzin ces bya ba dang /bkra shis 'dzin ces bya ba dang /kun dga' zhes bya ba dang /brgya byin zhes bya ba la sogs dbang po sum cu lha'i 'jig rten nas tshe 'phos pa dang //
177a7(mdo sde): dge ba'i las kyis der skyes pa dang /de'i dge ba'i las zad nas lha'i dbang po'i gnas de nas tshe 'phos te/de nas yang sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas rnams kyi
177b1(mdo sde): nang du skyes pa mthong zhing lus sdug bsngal du mas mngon par nyams pa dag mthong ngo //tshe rabs de dag gi nang du skyes pa de dag shin tu sdug bsngal zhing sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa de rnams gzug brnyan lta bur gyur pa
177b2(mdo sde): mthong ngo ///'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa//bam po sum nug cig yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skyes pa/lus bkres pa dang /
177b3(mdo sde): skom pas gdungs shing lus pags pa dang /rus pa dang /rgyus pas sbrel ba lta bu gang yin pa de dag dang /dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes pa/phan tshun lus la za ba'i sdug bsngal gyis
177b4(mdo sde): gdungs shing za ba gang yin pa de dag dang /mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa tshol ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mngon par gdungs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang mthong ste/de ltar de dag mthong nas 'khor ba mi zad
177b5(mdo sde): par byas pa la bde ba 'byung ba med cing /kye ma 'khor ba 'od kun ni gnod pa phal che zhing mang ba yin/kun nas snying po med pa yin/'khor ba 'dri la gang rtag pa 'am/brtan pa 'am/
177b6(mdo sde): thezer zug gam/mi 'gyur ba'i chos can skra'i rtse mo tsam yang med do//kye ma dbang po 'di dag rang gi lus kyi 'bras bu la longs spyad nas 'di nas tshe 'phos te/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro
177b7(mdo sde): dang /yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skyes pa rnams bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu'i mtha' sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu sten par go la nus/kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni shin tu mi zad pa yin zhing //
178a1(mdo sde): shin tu 'jigs pa yin la/mchog tu mi dga' bar byed pa yin no//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba shin tu bde ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa
178a2(mdo sde): dag kyang mchog tu mi zad pa'i gnas skabs 'di dag tu song ba lta zhig snyam sems so//de ltar de yid byung nas bdag nyid la rtog par byed de/de bdag nyid kyi ngan song gi 'gro ba ni
178a3(mdo sde): bcad/lha dag las mi rnams kyi nang du skye zhing /mi dag las tshe 'phos nas de nas yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //gang gi tshe mi rnams kyi nang du skye
178a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe yul bzang po shin tu rgyas pa'i ljongs dang /grong dang /grong khyer dang /rigs bzang po dang //spyod pa bzang zhing yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang /lta ba log
178a5(mdo sde): pa dang /khengs pa dang /rgyags pa dang /nga rgyal dang bral ba'i rigs bzang por sme bar 'gyur ro//gal te yang bdag nyid mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang de rgyal po'i rigs sam/
178a6(mdo sde): gal te blon po rtag tu spyod pa gtsang zhing yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dbang phyug dam pa mthu chen por 'gyur ba mthong ngo //'di ltar bdag mo yul de nas shi nas yang gar
178a7(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur zhig gu snyom mo//de bdag nyid lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/mchog tu rdzu 'phrul che zhing shin tu mthu che ba dang /ngo tsha ba kha na las pa med par 'gyur ro//lha
178b1(mdo sde): gzhan rnams kha zlas za ba'i dus de'i tshe lha rnams bdag nyid kyis sdig pa dang 'dres pa'i zas kyi las ngan bya bskyod pa des shin tu ngo tsha bar 'gyuraro//glang gi ji srid du las kyi rnam pa byas pa
178b2(mdo sde): desrid du de'i zas kyi rnam pa de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/zas de mngon par mthong nas lha rnams shin tu ngo tsha bor gyur to//de ltar bdag gi zas shin tu che ba mchog tu zhim pa rab tu mang
178b3(mdo sde): bad+ma dag bdag nyid kyis mthong nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag tshe rabs ji snyed cig tu 'di ltar 'gyur snyam nas des khang pa brtsegs pa'i brtsig pa de nyid la brtags na/dge
178b4(mdo sde): ba'i las des bdag lha rnams kyi nang du lan bdun mi rnams kyi nang bu gdun phan tshun tshe 'phro ba lan bdun mthong nas/bdag gi tshe 'phob brgyad pa lha rnams dang /mi rnams dang /sems
178b5(mdo sde): can dmyal ba rnams dang /dud 'gro rnams dang /yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skye ba ma mthong nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/'di dag gang du'ang bdag nyid ma mthong ste/bdag gang du
178b6(mdo sde): ji ltar skye bar 'gyur zhig gu sgyum mo//de bdag nyid gang du ying ma mthong nas/de shin tu ngo mtshar cher skyes te/kye ma bdag gi tshe brgyad pa ma mthong ngo snyam nas/de sems shing
178b7(mdo sde): 'dug 'dug pa las yun rang zhig lon pa dang dran pa rnyed de/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las bdag tshe rabs bdun brjes nas rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur la/phyis phung po'i lhag ma
179a1(mdo sde): med pa'i dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur zhes zas so//da ni bdug skal pa de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur sgyum ste/de ltar brtags nas/de nas yang bcom
179a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed de/yid shin tu dang zhing rnyog pa med pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed do//yid rab tu dga' bas phyag byas nas//de nas
179a3(mdo sde): yang gding ba shin tu 'byor pa btags pa las byas pa ma yin pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /dzam+bu chu bo'i gser bzang po'i stan de nyid la 'dug pa dang /brgya byin gyi gzugs de nyid brtsig
179a4(mdo sde): pa'i nang na snang ba mthong ngo //de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar bdag yang lha'i mdun sa chos bzang lha rnams yang dag par blta bar bya ba'i phyir 'jug par bya'o/
179a5(mdo sde): snyam mo//de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin stan de las langs nas tshal sna tshogs kyi phyogs ga la ba der 'gro bar byed de/der yang lha dang lha mo'i nang na dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod
179a6(mdo sde): par byed la/lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas dga' bar byed/yongasu spyod par byed do//bya dang shing ljon pa dang /pad+ma'i rdzing dang lteng ka dang nye ba'i
179a7(mdo sde): tshal gyi rnam pas mdzes par byas pa'i tshal sna tshog su de dag gis lha'i rgyal po brgya byin de mngon par mthong nas/de dag thams cad kyis sim snyan dang ril mo rnam pa sna tshogs dag
179b1(mdo sde): blangs te/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do//dong nas kyang brgya byin la gsong por smras shing brgya byin yongs su bskor nas/lha'i tshogs thams cad bro rdung bar byed/glu dbyangs
179b2(mdo sde): len/rgod par byed do//brgya byin sngar 'gro la/lha mo cha byad dang /gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag phyi bzhin 'brang zhing rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs der 'gro bar byed//
179b3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad yid rab tu dga' bas sil snyan dang /rol mo sna tshogs dang /gar byas/gad mo bgad/dga' bar byas/rtsed mo rtses nas lhan cig tu 'dong bar byed do//de nas chos
179b4(mdo sde): bzangs na gnas pa'i lha brgya byin la rim gro byed par 'dod pa rnams kyang /lha'i rgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed//de nas sil snyan dang /glu dbyangs kyi sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa'i lha de rnams
179b5(mdo sde): kyang phyir byung nas de dag phan tshun 'dus so//lho'i tshogs 'dus shing yang dag par dga' la/mngon par mthong ba de rnams kyi blo gar dang /glu'i sgro shin tu sbyin pa sred pa kun tu ston pa'i
179b6(mdo sde): sgra ngos lha'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa thams cad kun tu gang ngo //sgra de dag thos nas lha gang tshal dang /nye ba'i tshal gzhan rnams kyi nang 'khod pa dge lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lha rnams 'byor cing
179b7(mdo sde): ldan par gyur pas dga' bar byed rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed//de dag kyang lha'i mdun sa chos bzang ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/dong nas kyang brgya byin la gsong por smras shing rgyal
180a1(mdo sde): bar spyon cig ces brjod nas/'bum phrag du mar yongasu bskor te lha'i mdun sa chos bzang ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do//dge ba'i las sna tshogs kyis glu len/
180a2(mdo sde): blobro rdung zhing cha byad dang /rgyan rnam bzhi thogs pa der skyes pa dag ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa legs par bsrungs shing bsgoms pa de'i 'bras bu'i rnam pa yin te/de la nye bar
180a3(mdo sde): spyod par byed//lha'i tshogs thams cad chos bzang du zhugs te/brgya byin gyi gnas dpag tshad lnga brgyar rgya che zhing gser bcoms rnam par brgyan pa/bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pas nye bar
180a4(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa/shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang mdzes par byas pa/me tog 'jam pos rgyas pa shin tu dri zhim zhing dpag tshad lnga'i bar du dri rab tu 'byung bar byed pa/yid du thong
180a5(mdo sde): ba dga' bar byed la/sdug cing yid du 'thad pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa dag yod de/de dag thams cad kyang lha'i mdun sar brgya byin gyis yongs su bskyab pa yino//de dag
180a6(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang bcas shing lha mo'i tshogs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de rnams kyis dga' bar byed/rtse bar byed do//der zhugs
180a7(mdo sde): nas/khang bzangs rab tu dga' bar gnas pa zhes bya ba de'i nang du 'dong bar byed de/bai DUr+ya dang /gser dang /dngul dang /spug las byas pa'i ka ba rnams dang /gser las
180b1(mdo sde): byas pa'i stan rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa thags su btabs pa ma yin pa'i stan khra bo 'jam la noms shes byed cing 'phar la lhod pa rnams bting ba/steng du gding ba yon tan
180b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa'i stan rnams la lha'i tshogs thams cad brgya byin gyis gnang nas 'khod do//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha rnams la 'di skad smras so//bdag cag legs par byas
180b3(mdo sde): pa'i las des lha'i 'jig rten 'dir skyes la/de zad nas ltung ba ni gdon mi za'o//bdag cag thams cad las kyi 'bras bu'i bgo skal la ji ltar spyod pa bzhin bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang du
180b4(mdo sde): 'od la/de nas yang bdag cag ltung po'i mthar 'gyur te/de lta bas na lha dag sdug bsngal de dag thams cad mngon par shes par byas la dge ba lo 'bad par gyis shig/de nas brgya byin
180b5(mdo sde): gyi tshig de thos nas/de dag kun gyis brgya byin la 'di skad smras so//brgya byin khyod kyis de ji ltar thugasu chud pa de bzhin lags te/bdag cag kun de ltar rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar
180b6(mdo sde): spyod pa lha'i dga' ba dang bde ba de las ltung bar 'gyur na/de las gzhan pa bdag cag rgyu gang gis ltung bar mi 'gyur ba bstan du gsol/de nas brgya byin gyis lha de rnams la 'di skad
180b7(mdo sde): smras so//gang 'dus byas kyi rnam pa 'jig pa'i mtha' can rtag par 'gyur ba 'am/ther zug tu 'gyur ba 'am/mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi gnas de ni 'og gam/thad ka 'am/dbus
181a1(mdo sde): sam/steng na'ang med do//kun nas nyon mongs pa la rtag tu chags pa'i blo des ni cho ga 'drangs te/sdug bsngal la mtha' med cing legs pa med/badre ba'i
181a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin ma yin/rgyu dang rkyen khong du chud pa skyed pa ma yin/yang dag par bskyed pa yin/sdug bsngal gyi mtha' 'di lta bu la rtog par mi byed de/khyed cag phal cher
181a3(mdo sde): mtho ris nas tshe 'phos te/sems can dmyal ba dang /yi dgas dang /dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye'o//de nas yang legs par byas pa'i las kyis 'dir skyes pa rnams rang
181a4(mdo sde): gi las kyi 'bras bu'i bgo skal la spyod pa mtho ris na lha'i bde ba dag myong bar 'gyur ro//de nas yang las kyis gzings pa rnams ltung bar 'gyur te/sems can dmyal ba dang /
181a5(mdo sde): yi dgas dang /dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du nye bar spyod par 'gyur gyis lha rnams de la shin tu bag yod par gyis shig/'di ltar bdag gis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams
181a6(mdo sde): kyis mdor bsdus te gsungs pa'i chos de kho na dang /gzhan gang gis 'khor ba las thar par 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o//'di lta ste/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams//'du
181a7(mdo sde): byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/reg
181b1(mdo sde): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /smre
181b2(mdo sde): sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
181b3(mdo sde): yang ma rig pa 'gag pas 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur la/'du byed 'gag pas rnam par shes pa 'gag pa rnam par shes pa 'gags pas/ming dang gzugs 'gag/ming dang gzugs
181b4(mdo sde): 'gags pas/skye mched drug 'gag/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/sred pa 'gegs pas len pa
181b5(mdo sde): 'gag/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/skye ba 'gags pas/rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /
181b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro//de ltar lha dag 'khor ba
181b7(mdo sde): 'di'i 'jug pa dang ldog pa zhes bya ba mthong zhing shes na nyon mongs pa zad nas thar par 'gyur te/mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba/'jig pa med pa/rtag pa dga' ba med pa
182a1(mdo sde): 'chi ba med pa/zag pa med pa 'thob ste/de ltar lha dag srog tshogs rnams 'khor ba 'di las thar bar 'gyuraro//gang 'dus byas kyi rnam pa 'jig pa med pa'i mtha'
182a2(mdo sde): 'am/zad pa med pa'i mtha' 'am/chud za ba med pa'i mtha' 'am/tshe rab su 'gag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i gnas gzhan 'khor ba na med do//gang na gtan du bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
182a3(mdo sde): ltung ba'i mtha' med pa dang /zad pa dang 'jig pa'i mtha' med pa dang /'byung ba dang /'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can ma yin pa med do//de nas brgya byin gyi kha nas tshig de dag
182a4(mdo sde): thos nas/lha gang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu sems bsgoms pa dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga' zhing blo shin tu zhen pa de dag ni yid la bag yod par 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas dang /
182a5(mdo sde): chos dang /dge 'dun rnams la gcig tu dad la mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon bde ba'i las 'phen par byed do//yid ma bsgoms pa gang yin pa de dag de nas yang bag med cing sems
182a6(mdo sde): 'khrugs par 'gyur la/sred pas bslus pa rnams lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas dga' bar byedado//de nas yang des bslus pa rnams rtse ba don du
182a7(mdo sde): byed cing dga' bar byed de/de ltar de dag gi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' tshod par 'gyuraro//de ltar lha'i rgyal po brgya byin des chos bshad pa na 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams lha'i mdun sa
182b1(mdo sde): chos bzangs dag tu so sbyor 'khod de/'di ltar lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha rnams dang lhan cig glang na bzhugs shes dpyod par byed do//de nas de ltar brgya byin lha'i stan la 'dug cing lha'i tshogs
182b2(mdo sde): kyis yo su bskor la gzi brjid 'bar ba na/lha yul gyi bde ba dpo med pa du ma dang ldan pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //de mthong nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed//
182b3(mdo sde): do nas brgya byin la gsong por smra ste/lha'i stan mchog tu nyams dga' ba bzang po la phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas yang stan mchog tu nyams dga' ba bzang po de dag las langs te/brgya
182b4(mdo sde): byin ga la ba de log su phyogs nas 'dug ste/brgya byin la 'di skad smraso//lha'i dbang po 'di ltar dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon par brtson zhing chos la dga' ba/
182b5(mdo sde): mor 'dzin pa dang /par 'dzin pa dang /dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /bram zer 'dzin pa dang /rigs kyi rgan rabs la gus par 'apyid kyis/lha'i dbang po khyod dgyes par mdzad du gsol/
182b6(mdo sde): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin tshig de dag thos nas 'di skad smra so//lha dag pa dag ni dga'o//rgyal po chen po khyed cag ni 'jig rten skyong zhing 'jig rten la phan par 'dod pa phan gdags par rab tu
182b7(mdo sde): zhugs pa yin te/bdag gi dga' ba'ang thos nas/khyed bde leg su gyur cig/de nas dzam+bu'i gling du chos dang mi ldan zhing tshos ma yin pa'i rje su zhugs pa'i mi de dag de bzhin du 'jig
183a1(mdo sde): rten skyong ba rnams brgya byin la smra bar byed de/dzAm+bu'i gling na mi chos dang mi ldan zhing chos ma yin pa'i rje su 'jug pa mar mi 'dzin pa dang /par mi 'dzin pa dang /dge sbyong du/
183a2(mdo sde): mi 'dzin pa dang /bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang /rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rje su mi 'jug pa dag mchis te/bdud kyi phyogs ni 'phe lo//dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'grib bo zhes bsnyad do//lha'i
183a3(mdo sde): rgyal po brgya byin gyis de thos nas/rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa ji ltar phyogs pa rnams la bos nas smras pa/lha ma yin brtan pa dang /rab spro la sogs pa/
183a4(mdo sde): klu chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa rab 'jom la sogs pa sa'i 'og nas langs te/bdag cag la g.yul 'gyed du 'ong gis/lha khyed rnams chos shig/de nas brgya byin gyi bka' de mnos
183a5(mdo sde): nas/gang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams brgya byin gyi bkas shin tu rings par lag cha dang /mtshon cha sna tshogs snga ma bzhin thogs te/ri bo zla ba zhes bya ba'i rig la ba der 'dong
183a6(mdo sde): bar byed do//de nas 'jig rten skyong ba de rnams dong ba dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis ni bskor/lha'i phreng ba dang /gos ni gyon pa lang tsho la
183a7(mdo sde): bab pa'i gzugs rgyan sna tshogs kyis ni brgyan/lha mo rnams ni rjesu 'brang zhing lha'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang lhan cig thams cad mngon par 'byor ces bya ba ga la ba der
183b1(mdo sde): 'dong bar byed de/skyed mos tshol gang yin pa de ri rab dang sgra lta bur chung zad 'dra ba'i dper bya na/'di ltar zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba lta bu dang /nyi ma gza'i tshogs kyis
183b2(mdo sde): bskor ba mi mthun par mthong ba lta bu dang /ri rab gser gyi ri stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang /shing ljon pa lha'i gser dang /dngul dang /bai DUr+ya dang /mthon ka dang /pad+ma rag ga'i mdog
183b3(mdo sde): lta bu rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i skyed mos tshal de lha'i me tog gis mdzes par byas shing bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor la sgra skad snyan pa 'byin pa lha'i pad+ma'i rdzing gyis
183b4(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa yino//lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu zhes bya ba skyed mos tshal chen po de na rdzing de dag snga ma bzhin yod pa'i nang na bal glang mo dang lhan cig rtse
183b5(mdo sde): bar byed/gser dang /bai DUr+ya'i pad+ma'i nang na bal glang mo dang lhan cig rtse zhing yul der 'gro bar byed do//lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha'i rgyal po'i tshogs dang /lha mo'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis
183b6(mdo sde): yongs su bskor ba ltar/glang po che'i rgyal po de yang de lta bu yin la/pad+ma gser btso ma lta bu dang /nam mkha' la nyi ma 'bum phrag 'char ba de lta bu'i 'od bzang po 'char ba dang ldan pa
183b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa der de dga' bar byed/yongs su spyod par byed/rtsed mo byed/dud 'gror gyur kyang lha'i bde ba myong ba yin no//de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin der song nas
184a1(mdo sde): lag pa gnyis kyis byugs shing byi bder byed la/kye bdag gi glang po che'i rgyal po 'di ni g.yul 'gyed pa la dgos pa yin te/lha dang lha ma yin 'thab pa'i tshe//
184a2(mdo sde): 'di'i steng nas bdag rgyal ba thob bo//de nas glang po che mchog byi bdar byas nas/skyed mos tshal thams cad 'byor ldan na khang bzangs mya ngan bral zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'gro bar byed de/
184a3(mdo sde): chu'i zam pa lta bu'i skas de las 'dzegs nas/der lha dang /lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'jug par byed do//der zhugs nas lha'i rgyal po de lha mo bye ba phrag dgu'i mdun
184a4(mdo sde): na rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed do//lha'i rgyal po de rnams dang lhan cig lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/yongs su
184a5(mdo sde): spyod par byed do//lha'i rgyal po rang gi las dang mthun par longs spyod 'byor te/lha de dag dang lha'i rgyal po de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa/yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa dang /
184a6(mdo sde): so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba bde ba'i rnam par smin pa/bde ba so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du 'di ltar skyed mos tshal brgya snyed kyis
184a7(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i lha'i mdun sa chos bzang gi skyed mos tshal de na bde ba kun dang ldan zhing lha'i tshogs thams cad dang bcas pas yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo rnams kyis rtse bar byed/
184b1(mdo sde): dga' bar byed do//de dag phyis lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs nas 'tsho bar 'gyur te/shi nas kyang ji ltar las de dang nye bar 'gro zhing myong bar 'gyur ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
184b2(mdo sde): yi dgas dang /dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/de las de dang rgyu mthun par mchog tu bde ba dang rig pa'i dri ma
184b3(mdo sde): med pa dang /phan tshun gyi gtso bo 'am/gling gi gtso bo 'am/yul gyi gtso bo 'am/grong khyer gyi gtso bo'am/phan tshun gyi gnyen mdab dang /rtsa lag dang /bde bar lhan cig 'khod par
184b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//lha'i rgyal po de ni ngan song gi sgo bcad pa yin te/lha de dag gi 'chi 'pho ba la mngon par brtags nas 'di ltar tshig su bcad de smras pa/sa gang yin pa de dag gi/tshal ni pad+ma sna
184b5(mdo sde): tshogs dang //ts+tsho mo mchog ste nyams dga' dang //rin po che dang ldan pa dang //mtsho dang 'bab chu rin po che'i//rdo ba sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan//ljon shing me tog sna tshogs dang //bya ni
184b6(mdo sde): sna tshogs dag gis khebs//gser las byas pa dpag bsams shing //kha cig dri med bai DUr+ya//dngul dang gser ni btso ma yin//tshal ni rnam par 'dres pa bskyed//bung ba rnams ni sgra
184b7(mdo sde): 'byin pas//pad+ma'i rdzing ni rnam par mdzes//khang bzangs mchog ni nyams dga' zhing //rin po che ni tshe dang ldan//rnam par brgyan pa nyams dga' ste//lha la 'os pa thams cad yod//
185a1(mdo sde): de dag thams cad de bzhin 'dug/skye bo rnams ni yongasu 'gyur//kye ma sred pas bslus pa yi//lha rnams kun gyi bde ba ni//sgyu mchu bur dbu pa dang //dri za'i
185a2(mdo sde): grong khyer lta bu yin//srid pa dug dang me 'dra ba//'jig rten 'jig pa'i phyir gnas te//sred pa'i mtshor ni 'khyim byed cing //skye bo de kun 'jig par byed//'dod pa ledra par tshig mi shes/bde ba 'dod pa/
185a3(mdo sde): chog mi shes/'chi ba'i me yis rnam bsregs pa//lha tshogs de dag ga la 'ongs//sred 'dis 'jig rten gzigs pa rnams//ye nas ngan te 'phags pa min//gang gis rnam par rmongs pa'i
185a4(mdo sde): lha//'chi ba yi ni dbang du song //lha dang mi dang lha ma yin//gnod sbyin sems can dmyal ba klu//'chi ba'i zhags pas mi zad par//thams cad dbang med 'gro bar 'gyur//khams
185a5(mdo sde): gsum pa ste 'di dag kun//'chi ba'i zhags pas sbrel gyur kyang //srid pa'i rmongs pas rmongs pa rnams//dbang med mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//de ltar brgya byin gyis rtag tu lha de rnams kyi
185a6(mdo sde): skye ba dang /gzhan mi rtag pa 'chi bdag mthong nas/lha dag shin tu go bar bya ba'i tshig su bcad smras pa/'byung po kun la phan bzhed pa//bcom ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo//gang
185a7(mdo sde): gis sred pa dug 'dra 'di//'jig rten pa la mang du gsungs//mdor na shos dang shes bya dag/de yis 'di kun thugasu chud//shes dang shes bya ma gtogs par//gsum par
185b1(mdo sde): dmigs par mi 'gyuraro//'di ni mi rtag sdug bsngal stong //byed pa po yang spangs pa yin//de nyid lam ni rnam ston pa//sangs rgyas kyis ni 'khor ba gsungs//de ltar dbang po 'di phyag rgya
185b2(mdo sde): 'dis btab pa'i yid dri ma med pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod do//bstod nas de nas yang lha'i bde ba 'ang nyams su myong bar byed de/de ltar de lha'i bde ba thams cad myong ba yin no//de nas yang
185b3(mdo sde): dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa dris sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas
185b4(mdo sde): mtho ba na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //sems can dag las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na 'di ltar gang gzhan gyis
185b5(mdo sde): gsod pa po dag nyi ma gcig tsam du srog gcod pa spong ba'i tshul khrims srung du gtsug la/'khor ba las thar pa 'dod pa rnams ma byin par len pa dang /rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs nas 'bras
185b6(mdo sde): bu chung ngur 'gyur ba yang spong du 'jug na/de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na mtho ba'i gnasu skye bar 'gyur ro//gnas mtho ba de'ang ri rab kyi steng na mtho ba
185b7(mdo sde): yin la khyed cag gi las sna tshogs snang ba bzhin gser dang dngul gyi bgro bas phye ba yin no//lha rnams mtho ba'i gnas der 'jigs nas/ri rab kyi drung thams cad lta bar byed de/gser dang
186a1(mdo sde): dngul las byas shing /bai DUr+ya bkra bas rnam par phye ba rnam pa dus lalta bar byed do//lha'i phreng ba dang gos gyon pa rnams gser gyis brgyan pa'i sa bzhi rnams la dga' bar
186a2(mdo sde): byed/yongasu spyod par byed la/lha mo'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing sdug pa dang /lhan cig bai DUr+ya tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rnamasu dga' bar byed/yongasu spyod par byed do//der de dag
186a3(mdo sde): gi rtag tu bza' ba dang /btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab ste/'di lta ste/chu bo ro zhim pa zhes bya ba dang /chu bo shugs chen 'bab ces bya ba dang /chu bo dga' bcas zhes bya ba dang /chu bo dga'
186a4(mdo sde): bcas ches zhes bya ba dang /chu bo brtsegs 'bab ces bya ba dang /chu bo shugs phreng zhes bya ba dang /chu bo stong 'bab ces bya ba dang /chu bo gar dgar 'bab ces bya ba ste/chu bo de dag ni myos
186a5(mdo sde): pa'i skyon dang bral zhing btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad rab tu 'bab pa yin no//ro sna tshogs dang mdog sna tshogs yod pa yin te/'di lta ste 'o ma'i mdog dang /pad+ma ra ga'i mdog dang /
186a6(mdo sde): an+da rnyil gyi mdog dang mthun pa dang /bai DUr+ya'i mdog dang /gser gyi mdog ltar ser ba dang /kha cig mdog 'dres pa dang /chu shin tu dri zhim zhing brtan pa dag tu khyad par 'phags
186a7(mdo sde): paba'ang 'bab bo//gzhan yang bza' ba ro dang /dri dang mdog sna tshogs su 'byung ste/'di lta ste/ro sha kha ra 'dra ba dang /lha'i dri dang /mdog dang mdog skya bo dang //ro ji ltar 'dod pa dag
186b1(mdo sde): s+t+waM/lha rnams ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du bza' ba rnams kyi ro de dag kyang de ltar 'gyur//tshal dang /nags tshal sna tshogs dgu me tog rje zhim po rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas shing bya /
186b2(mdo sde): dog sna tshogs dang /rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin to//de dag sa'i phyogs nyams dga' ba de lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor nas sil snyan dang /glu dbyangs dang /
186b3(mdo sde): broblo gar sna tshogs kyis rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/yongasu spyod par byed do//der tshal 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/shing sA la'i tshal dang /shing sA la chen po'i tshal dang /ji ltar 'dod pa'i
186b4(mdo sde): shing ljon pa'i tshal dang /me tog rtag tu yod pa'i tshal dang /rlung ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bde bar 'bab pa'i tshal te/tshal dga' ba de rnams na/gser gyi lcug ma 'phyang bas ni mdzes
186b5(mdo sde): dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas ni dkrigs bya 'bum snyed sgra 'byin pa dga' ba lha'i dbang po 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i 'de ba dag gis lha rnams nye bar 'tshe bar byed do//phan tshun grogasu gyur cing
186b6(mdo sde): phan tshun longs pa gcig pu don du byed pa/nad dang mya ngan dang bral ba/bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral ba/lus ngan pa dang bral ba/tshol ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/tso dgar
186b7(mdo sde): spyod pa la brtson pa/ci dgar rgyu ba/ci dgar gnas pa dag tshal gyi nang dang /skyed mos tshal dang /pad+ma'i tshal dang /mthong na yid 'phrog rnamasu dga' bar byed do//mtho ba na gnas pa 'dod
187a1(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan lngas tshim pa'i lha rnams 'od ni rang gi 'od la lus ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/phra ba dang /sdom pa dang /yang bar sbyar ba/ci dgar 'gro ba/gar
187a2(mdo sde): dgrar 'gro ba/rang dgar 'gro ba/gang thob par 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur zhing /thob nas sus kyang mi 'phrogs pa thob nas de'i dbang du 'gyur ro//mtho bo'i gnas na gnas par gyur
187a3(mdo sde): pa'i lha de rnams la bde ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang yod de/rang gis legs par byas pa'i las rgyu dang 'bras bus kun nas bslang bas ji srid du 'dod cing sdug la yid du 'ong ba
187a4(mdo sde): legs par bsrungs pa'i tshul khrims srog gcod pa dang /ma byin par len pa spangs pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod
187a5(mdo sde): par byed do//der las zad nas lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/shi nas las kyis 'gro ba ji lta ba dang las la rtog pa dang /'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin skye bar 'gyur to//
187a6(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba dang /yi dgas dang /dud 'gro rnams kyi nang na skye bar 'gyur ro//gal te mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/de las do dang rgyu mthun par
187a7(mdo sde): ri la gnas po rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /nor dang shin tu ldan pa dang /rab tu bde ba dang /mchog tu gzugs bzang ba dang /'jig rten gyi bar bzang por dro ba dang
187b1(mdo sde): bsil ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par
187b2(mdo sde): byed do//des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas ri rtse na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/des
187b3(mdo sde): thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na gang gis lus kyi tshul khrims rnam gnyis bsrungs pa yin te/srog chags gsad par chad pa dang /bcings pa thar bar byas shing mthu
187b4(mdo sde): rab tu che bar gyur la nus par ldan pa zhig lam du zhugs te bkres shing skom bzhin du bu ram shing ngam ldum ra 'am/rdzi'u grong dag tu ba'i bcud dam/bu ram shing gi bcud ma
187b5(mdo sde): byin par blangs pa/sems can gsad par bya ba/ma byin par blangs nas 'jigs te 'gro ba thar par byas pa'i skyes bu dam pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig
187b6(mdo sde): rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas ri rtser gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//der skyes nas kyang de bde ba'i longs spyod du ma dang ldan zhing de yul chu bo lta bu du mas bdas pa
187b7(mdo sde): yin la/de'ang 'dod chags chu bo lta bu yin/'di lta ste 'dod chags kyi chu bo dang /rgyags pa'i glong dang /mgu ba'i gling du chags pa dang /kun dga'i chu mig dang /kun tu
188a1(mdo sde): rtog pa'i rlabs dang /gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya sdug pa'i bya dang /lta ba chu srin 'dzin khri kun tu 'khrugs pa dang /rab tu thogs
188a2(mdo sde): padu ma ya yor 'gro ba dang /tshal dang /nye ba'i tshal chu yis bar bur dad pa dang /phra dog ga nyi dang /spro ba chu las brgal ba dang /yul du ma'i ri khrod nas chu 'bab ste/srid pa'i
188a3(mdo sde): chu bo 'dam rdzab la sogs pa rnam pa de lta bu dag las lha rnams 'byung bar mi nuso//gzhan yang chu bo gang+gA'i pha rol gyi 'gram gyi rlabs mi mngon pa ltar/thog ma med pa'i dus nas/
188a4(mdo sde): rgyun du shin tu zab mor rab tu zhugs pa/'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa'i khams na skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug
188a5(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rlabs lta bus khyab cing myur du 'gro ba'i sred pa chu klung lta bu de sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu yang yin la/me rnams kyis kyang cho ga po
188a6(mdo sde): 'dzin mi nus te/de ltar sred pa'i rnam pa chu bo lta bus ri rtsen gnas pa'i lha rnams rab tu 'daso//der lha de dag lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor te/lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
188a7(mdo sde): rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas dga' bar byed/rtse bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//der chal de lta bu de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/'di lta ste/tshal rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya
188b1(mdo sde): ba dang /tshol rtag tu mngon dga' zhes bya ba dang /tshal sprin ltar dkar brtsegs zhes bya ba dang /tshal kun nas mngon dga' zhes bya ba dang /tshal zla ba 'dra zhes bya ba dang /tshal gang+gA'i steng du
188b2(mdo sde): rgyu zhes bya ba ste/tshal 'di dag ni ri rtse na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yin no//tshal de rnams kyi nang du lha dgra bde ba du ma dang ldan zhing /bud med kyi dga' ba rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga'
188b3(mdo sde): dgur spyod par byedado//btung ba'i chu bo rnams kyang 'di lta ste/chu bo sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang /chu bo lag mthil gyis byug cing reg pa zhes bya ba dang /chu bo ngoms mi myong zhes bya ba dang /chu bo mo
188b4(mdo sde): tog ku mu da dang /ut+pa la skye zhes bya ba ste/chu bo de dag gi 'gram gnyis ka ril khebs pa yi no//dngul dang /shel dang /gser gyi shing ljon pa 'bras bu dang ldan zhing me tog dang ldan pa
188b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis lha'i sa gzhi de dag nyams dga' bar brgyan pa'i sa gzhi der dge ba'i las sna tshogs dang /byas pa sna tshogs kun nas bslang ba rnams kyis tshal de dag dang /chu bo de dag dang /
188b6(mdo sde): sa gzhi de dag dang /zas dang skom chu bo ltar 'bab pa de dag tu/de rnams lha'i rol mo dang /lha'i gnas pa chen po dang /thags su btags pa ma yin pa'i lha'i gos rnams kyis dga' bar
188b7(mdo sde): byed do//lha de rnams rang las 'od 'byung la/sha dang /rus pa dang /rnag khrag dang bral ba/lus dang ngag dang yid ngal ba dang bral ba/lus dang yid rtag tu kun nas dga' ba rnams ji
189a1(mdo sde): srid du lus dang ngag gi 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba shin tu bsil ba rnam par smin pa mchog tu bde ba mtho ris su skye ba nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i las ma
189a2(mdo sde): zad pa de srid du 'gros 'chos shing dga' bar byed/rtse bar byed/yongasu spyod par byed do//de dag zad de lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur la shi nas kyang las ji ltar byas pa bzhin sems
189a3(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba mir 'grub pa'i las kyis mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/
189a4(mdo sde): de las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu longs spyod can du 'gyur zhing rtag tu shes pa la dga' ba/yid la rgod pa dang /rtsed mo dang /rtse ba dang /yul bzang por skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo ///
189a5(mdo sde): de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/sum cu rtsa gsum na lha rnams kyi gnas gzhan gang zhig
189a6(mdo sde): yod snyam nas/des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/blta na sdug pa gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gnas ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar
189a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba snyam nas/des brtags na gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/sems can gzhan chus khyer ba 'am/mtshon gyis gsad par bya ba srog phyung zhing //nor rdzas sam/bdag
189b1(mdo sde): nyid la mi lta bar chu nas phyung ba dang /bkres bzhin du lam du 'gro ba na gzhan gyis ma byin par blang ba la rab tu spro ba bskyed kyang len par mi byed/gzhan yang phyogs dben par byin la 'tsho ba nyam
189b2(mdo sde): nga bar gyur kyang 'bras bu dang rtsa ba dag ma byin par len par mi byed cing /tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma lus par bslab pa'i gzhi rdul phra mo tsam ral ba la'ong 'jigs par lta na de lus dang
189b3(mdo sde): bral nas bde 'gro grong khyer chen po lta na sdug tu skye bar 'gyuraro//grong khyer de yang dpag tshad khri yod la/khyams khris legs par rnam par phye ba yi no//grong khyer de'i sa gzhi dzam+bu'i
189b4(mdo sde): gser las byas la/kun nas khang po chen po bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /gzhan yang dngul las byas pa dang /gzhan yang dzam+b+ha chu bo'i gser las byas pa dang /mthon ka sna tshogs las
189b5(mdo sde): byas pa dang /gzhan yang rin po che sna bdun lasau byas pa'i khri dag gis bkra bar phye ba yi no//de dag gi srang yang kun nas shin tu rnam par phye ba yon la/bzhi mdo dang /ba gam dang /
189b6(mdo sde): sgo dang /pu shu'i rtse mo dang /khang bzangs kyis ris shin tu rnam par phye ba yin no//khang pa de dag kyang nyi ma gang med kyang /sgron ma lta bur 'gyur te/ji ltar nyi ma med na sgron ma
189b7(mdo sde): gsal bar byed pa de ltar nyi ma med kyang khang pa'i mchog de rnams las de ltar 'od 'byung ngo //grong khyer de dag kun nas tshal dang /nye ba'i tshal de rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te//
190a1(mdo sde): tshal dang nye ba'i tshal kha cig bai DUr+ya las byas pa dag la mu tig gi dra bas bres/kha cig gser gyi shing ljon pa dag la dngul gyi dra bas bres/kha cig dngul gyi shing
190a2(mdo sde): ljon pa dag la gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'byin/kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa'i skyed mos tshal bkra ba yin la/kha cig dpag bsam gyi shing yin te/lha gang
190a3(mdo sde): dag gi yid la bsams pa de tshal de dag las thob par 'gyuraro//tshal kha cig an+da rnyil dang /bai r+ya las byas pa yin te/de gser gyi bya rnams sgra snyan pa sna tshogs 'byin la/
190a4(mdo sde): gser gyi tshal gang yin pa de na dngul gyi bya rnams skad snyan pa 'byin cing rtse/mthon ka'i tshal gang yin pa de na bya pad+ma rA ga'i mdog tu 'dug pa rnams skad snyan pa'i byin cing rtse/gser
190a5(mdo sde): gyi tshal gang yin pa de na bya lus sna tshogs 'dres pa rnams skod snyan pa 'byin cing rtse ste/de ltar grong khyer chen po legs par mthong na nye ba'i tshal du gyur pa rnams mdzes pa yin
190a6(mdo sde): no//srang dang gser gyi khang pa mdzes par byas pa gang yin pa de dag la dngul gyi ka ba dang /bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin/gser gyi srang grang
190a7(mdo sde): yin pa de dag la bai DUr+ya'i ka ba btsugs shing gser gyi shing ljon pa dang /khong pas brgyan/srang dang /khyim 'dres pas mdzes par byas po gang yin pa de na bya gser gyi
190b1(mdo sde): mdog can yod de/grong khyer lta na sdug gang dang gang du snang ba de dang de dpe med par mthong ngo //grong khyer de'ang kun nas tshal chen po bzhi rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te/'di lta ste//
190b2(mdo sde): drudra ba'i phreng ba dang /shing chen po dang /'od gsal ba dang /mthong na dga' bas so//tshal thams cad dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu yod de/tshal de thams cad na chu bo chen po
190b3(mdo sde): khri yod pa gser gyi pad+mas khebs pa yin no//chu bo de dag shin tu nyams dga' ba yin zhing 'gram gnyis ka zhig pa med la/de dag gisar dang /dngul dang /shel dang /
190b4(mdo sde): an+da rnyil dang /shing ldan pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no//tshal chen po de dag bung ba 'dab ma bai DUr+ya la lus dngul du 'dug pa'i tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par
190b5(mdo sde): byas pa yin te/gang bu ba rnams kyi sgra snyan pa'i drung na mi'i gling bu'i sgras bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do//bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa rnams la 'bras bu gser gyi mdog can
190b6(mdo sde): shin tu dri zhim zhing khar snyib pas ches lhag pa'i ro dag yod la/'bras bu rnams kyi dri gang yin pa dpag tshad du 'byung ngo //bya rnams ngo bo nyid kyi rgyags pa yin la/de nas dri
190b7(mdo sde): gang yin pa des brgya gyur du shin tu rgyags par 'gyur ro//gser gyi shing ljon pa gang yin pa de rnams la dngul gyi 'bras bu lha'i dri dang /mdog dang /ro lnga dang ldan pa dag 'byung /
191a1(mdo sde): shing ljon pa bai DUr+ya'i sdong po dang gser gyi 'dab ma yod pa gang yin pa de rnams la 'bras bu kha dog sna tshogs yod pa dag 'byung ste/de ltar tshal kha dog rnam
191a2(mdo sde): pa du ma/rnam pa sna tshogs dpe med pa gzhan dang mi 'dra bas//grong khyer chen po lta na sdug yongs su bskor nas rnam par gnas so//kun tu rtog pa'i ri mo bris pa ltar lha'i las
191a3(mdo sde): rnam pa du ma byas shing las rnam pa du ma sna tshogs byas pa rnams kyis de rnams kyang sna tshogs su byung ba yin te/de ltar 'bras bu rgyu dang mthun par rgyu'i 'bras bu yin no//ji
191a4(mdo sde): ltar sa bon gyi rnam pa ji srid yod pa de srid du 'bras bu'i rnam pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur te/de ltar grong khyer lta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha rnams bde ba mang po du ma dag gis
191a5(mdo sde): phrogs pa yin no//gong khyer de ngo bo nyid kyis legs mthong nyid yin te/tshal khang bzangs gser dang /byu ru dang /smug dag gis brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa/dril bu g.yer
191a6(mdo sde): kha'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis dkrigs pa/gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha sgra snyan pa 'byin pas mdzes par byas pa/tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang /skyed mos tshal de dag tu lta na sdug na gnas
191a7(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams 'khod do//lha'i grong khyer na gnas rgyan dang /rol mo dang /sil snyan rtag tu sgra 'byin pa rab tu 'byin cing /lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis kun tu gang ba de na btung
191b1(mdo sde): ba dang phreng ba dag gis mdzes par byas la/rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dag rlung gis rab tu bskyod do//yang ri rab kyi steng gi grong khyer du lha'i tshogs bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma dag
191b2(mdo sde): gis kun tu gang zhing las chen po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa de na/'di ltar lha mthu rab tu che ba mchod par 'os pa chen po/rdzu 'phrul che ba/skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod la rtag tu yid mi
191b3(mdo sde): dga' ba/lha dang lha mo'i tshogs 'bum phrag du mas kun tu gang ba sa ya phrag 'bum 'khod pa rnams brgya byin gyis ma lus par yongasu shes so//gang gi tshe lha de rnams gal te lha'i grong khyer
191b4(mdo sde): chen po skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod de nas skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byed du 'gro ba de'i tshe lha rnams shing rta 'bum phrag du ma rnams dang 'gro ste/lha de rnams 'gro ba na/rgyal mtshan dang /ru mtshon
191b5(mdo sde): sdug gu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i shing rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang /kha dog sdug gu rnam pa sna tshogs dang /dbyibs sna tshogasu 'dug pa bye phrag stong dkrigs pa dag byung //'di lta ste/
191b6(mdo sde): in+da d+hal las byas pa'i gzhal med khang gang yin pa de la shing rta'i mda' pad+ma rA gA las byas shing /de la shing rta'i steng gi khang pa rin po che las byas/lam ni spug las byas/phyi rol ni bai
191b7(mdo sde): DUr+ya las byas/sa ris ni gseng las byas la/kun nas dril bu g.yes khi 'khrigs pa'i sgra 'byin pa yin no//de nas yang lha rnams gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan gyis 'gro bar
192a1(mdo sde): byed de/'di lta ste/shIng rta'i mda' ni gser las byas/shing rta'i steng gi khang pa ni bai DUr+ya las byas/sa ris ni sdug las byas/mu tig gi dra bas ni g.yogs/
192a2(mdo sde): phyirol ni rin po che ma rgad lta bu las byas/ngos ni byu ru las byas/srog shing ni dngul las byas pa yin no//kha cig shing rta'i mchog rnam pa gzhan gyis 'gro bar byed de/'di lta ste/
192a3(mdo sde): kun nas shing rta'i mda' ni gser los byas/ngos ni mu tig gis g.yogs/sa rIs ni pad+ma rags shin tu rnam par phye/srog shing ni dngul las byas/kun nas b+hu rus ni mdzes par byas
192a4(mdo sde): po sbyin te/shing rta 'bum phrag mang po gsal ba mtshan nyid dpe med pa de dag lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor te/'bum phrag rnam pa du mi de rnams la lha dag nyid zhon
192a5(mdo sde): nas tshal chen do de rnams ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/rgyal mtshan la la bai DUr+ya las byas//rgyal mtshan la la gsor las byas/yub la la dngul las byas/rgyal mtshan la
192a6(mdo sde): la'i yu ba pad+ma rA ga las byas/rgyal mtshan dang /ru mtshon la la'i mdog du mi yod po dag gis na mkha' bar med par byas nas/skyed mos tshul du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/yid
192a7(mdo sde): rab tu dga' bis tshal chen po pon bo ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do//de ltar lha de rnams 'dong ba na sil snyan bye ba 'bum phrag du mo sgra 'byin cing //rol mo'i snyan po sna tshogs
192b1(mdo sde): phan tshun ngom par zhugs pa dag yod de/shin tu bzung shing nyams dga' ba'i khyad par che ba yin no//ji ltar las byas pa ngan pa dang /'bring dang /chen po byas pa bzhin las bde ba rnams kyi
192b2(mdo sde): rje su 'jug pa na 'dong bar byed de/lha de rnams so so la lha mo'i tshogs bgyi 'am/stong ngam/'bum rnams gar byed//glu len/rab tu rgod cing yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo snyan pa dang
192b3(mdo sde): bcas pa rdob pa zhes bya ba kun tu gang zhing byed la tshal chen po zhes bya ba gaM la ba der 'dong bar byed do//lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa'i lha mo de dag thams
192b4(mdo sde): cad lha de rnams dang so sor phrad nas de ltar br-i gar byed/rgod par byed/rtsed mo byedado//'di ltar lha de rnams 'dod pa la rnam par zhen pa zhes bya ba dga' bar byed de/lha'i sgra snyan pa tshang tshing
192b5(mdo sde): gi nang na lha'i snyan pa de dang /gar dga' dgur 'gro ba'i lha de rnams lha'i 'dod pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis der skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar byed de/la la namakha' la sprin nag po
192b6(mdo sde): 'gro ba lta bu bai DUr+ya'i mdog can de rnams 'gro bar byed/lha'i mchog de dag kha cig ni 'di ltar/rgyan sna tshogs dang /goso sna tshogs dang /cha byad sna tshogs dang /dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs
192b7(mdo sde): kyis dga' gtam smra zhing na mkha' khyab par byas nas chel chen po ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do//lha'i mchog gzhan kha cig ni gser gyi sa gzhi'i lam nas rab tu 'gro la/'gro ba de
193a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi shing rta 'bum phrag du ma'i mu khyud kyis gser gyi rdul bsgreng ste na mkha' khyab par byas nas 'dug go//gang gis na mkha' de skye bor byed/lha rnams
193a2(mdo sde): la bgo bar mi byed la/lha gang 'chi ba dang /nye bar 'gyur ba de rnams kyi gdong ngam/gos de la ni 'gro bar byed//lho gang gzhan dag gis rdul te mthong zhing 'chi ba'i ltas mthong
193a3(mdo sde): la/de 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' med par 'gyur ba mngon par mthong nas/de snying rje rje lta bur gyur pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar tshigasu bcad de smras pa/bud shing lta bu'i yul
193a4(mdo sde): 'byung dang //mes bsregs lta bu'i 'chi 'gyur ba//lam 'di nas ni lha rnams dag/brgya 'am yang na stong du 'dir//'chi ba gzhan gyis mthong 'gyur la//bdag nyid kyis ni ma mthong
193a5(mdo sde): ste/phyi nas nyon mongs phrad pa dang //bdag nyid kyis ni sdug bsngal rig/bag med pa dang 'dres pa'i sems//yul la rtag tu mngon par dga'//lus can lhan cig skyes gnas pa//
193a6(mdo sde): 'chi ba brtan pa mi rig gi//bag med pa la mngon dga' zhing //bde ba nyams dga' byed pa na//'chi bdag sde yis 'di drangs pa//rab tu 'jom ste dug dang 'dra//'chi ba'i zhags pas bzung
193a7(mdo sde): ba yi//khyod la skyob pa byed med de//sman dang sngags dang las mi skyob//de bzhin lha min lha min skyob//rdul rnams kyis ni gdong g.yogs pa//bdag nyid kyis ni mi rig ste//'di
193b1(mdo sde): ni'achi ba'i pho nya yin//shi ba phyi nas thob par 'ong //gang zhig bde ba'i don ma mthong //skye ba rtag tu brkam chags shing //sred pas ngoms na ma myong ba//glo bur du ni 'chi bar 'gyur//
193b2(mdo sde): 'chi bas btang ba chen po 'di//khyod kyi pho nya dang po ste//'di yi 'og tu 'chi ba yang //shin tu mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur//tshal dang nye ba'i tshal brgyan pa//rang gi las kyi 'bras bu
193b3(mdo sde): spyad//sems can ri bo mchog de nas//dbang med bcings te khrid par 'gyur//myos pas rtse bar gnas pa dag/bde bas ngoms ni mi myong zhing //rmongs pa sred pa ma ngoms pa//dbang med
193b4(mdo sde): sa steng ltung bar 'gyur//ji ltar rtag tu me dag las//du ba sngar ni 'byung 'gyur ba//de ltar 'chi ba'i rtags byung ste//phyi nas 'chi ba gnas par 'gyur//de ltar lha de dag bag med pa
193b5(mdo sde): chung ba la gnas shing /sems sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa la goms pa yin la/lha de'i bar chad de mthong nas bdag nyid dang lha de rjes su ston par byed//de ltar lha de'i gtam sla ba na/shing rta
193b6(mdo sde): la zhon pa/shing rta sna tshogs la zhon zhing /shing rta'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas dkrigs pa/lus cha byad du mas 'bar ba/mig rgyas pa lta bur 'dug pa/lha'i phreng ba dang /gos gyon
193b7(mdo sde): pa gser btsoms rnam par brgyan pa/gang ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo stong snyed du phye mar rlog cing 'ong ngo //de nas lha de lha'i tshogs de rnams rtog cing 'ong ba na/de bzhin du la la ni nam mkha' la/
194a1(mdo sde): la la nis/la la ni bya'i shing rta rnams kyis/la la ni lha mo dang lhan cig glu len/blo rdung zhing 'ong ste/tshul dang nye ba'i tshal de dag lha'i pad+ma dang /shing ljon pa dang /
194a2(mdo sde): chu bo dang /bya dang /'bras bu dang /me tog dang /rin po che sna tshogs dang /kun nas mchog tu nyams dga' ba'i tshol dang /nye ba'i tshal gyi phyogs ga la ba der 'ding bar byed de/lhan
194a3(mdo sde): sdug na gnas pa'i lha de rnams shing rta'i mchog de dag la zhon nus/gser gyi shing ljon pa nyi ma lta bu yod pA ga la ba der dong ngo //glang gzhan par snang la rgyu ba de dag kyang bar snang
194a4(mdo sde): las babs nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der dong ngo //de ltar lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad 'dus nas sil snyan gyi sgra dang /glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dga' bar byed/yongasu
194a5(mdo sde): spyod par byed de/phan tshun grogs su gyur cing /phan tshun 'gyed pa dang /phrag dog la skyo ba med pa rnams bro gar byed/rgod par byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//sil snyan yan lag
194a6(mdo sde): lnga dang ldan pa la 'di lta ste/rgyud dang /rnga dang /sil dkrol dang /gling bu'i sgra dang /glu ste rnam pa 'di lngas kha zas chu bo ltar 'bab pa dang /datung pa chu bo ltar 'bab pa'i dogs su lha
194a7(mdo sde): da lha mo'i tshogs de dag phan tshun dga' zhing lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal der bcas nas gang na bai DUr+ya dang gser gyi 'bras bu yod pa/'bras bu mdog dang dri zhim pa ro mngar ba/sbrang
194b1(mdo sde): rtsi lta bu rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te/de shing ljon pa'i drung de dag tu'ang 'dod pa nyams dga' ba'i lha mo gzugs mi mdzes pa med pa'i gzugs rnams dang lhan cig 'bras bu'o ros
194b2(mdo sde): myos nas yun ring du dga' bar byed do//de nas de ltar bde ba la gnas shing rgyags pas myos pa'i lha dang lha mo'i tshogs de rnams bro gar dang /glu dbyangs dang /dgod pa'i sgra de dge thos shing /gang
194b3(mdo sde): rgyal po brgya byin gyi rje su 'gro la phyi bzhin du 'brang ba de rnams sgra de dag thos nas/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong par byed do//de ltar de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi drung du dong nas/brgya byin
194b4(mdo sde): la gsong por smras shing /zil mo sbyar nas mgo bo la gtugs te/brgya byin la bsnyad pa/lha'i dbang po 'di ltar lta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad sgyid mos tshal du dga' spyod
194b5(mdo sde): bgyid du mchi na/lha'i dbang po de dag mkhyen par mdzod cig/de nas brgya byin de dag las tshig de thos nas/lha rnams la 'di ltar lta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha dag gang nas dong ba'i skyed mos tshal du
194b6(mdo sde): bdag cig kun 'dong gis khyed rnams 'dong bar shoms shig ces bsgo'o//de nas brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang shing rta rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can la zhon
194b7(mdo sde): la la gser gyi shing rta srog shing bai DUr+ya las byas pa ba dan btags pa rnams la zhon/la la bai DUr+ya'i shing rta srog shing gser las byis pa rnams la zhon/la le ni rin po che sna bdun
195a1(mdo sde): bkra zhing ba dan sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa rnams la zhon/la la gser gyi bya sgra snyan cing shin tu mdzes par 'byung ba'i bya'i shing rta rnams la zhon/la la rta khra bo
195a2(mdo sde): 'gros 'jam zhing bde ba dag la shing d+hAs blangs nas/shing rta de rnams rted de rnams la btag te d+h+rU'i shing rtas 'gro bar byed/de ltar gzhan yang gser gyi bya ngang pa rkang pa ni bai DUr+ya/sgro ni pad+ma raga'i mdog
195a3(mdo sde): lta bu rnams kyi steng du zhon nas/lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang lhan cig tu lta na sdug gi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /skyed mos tshal ga la ba yod pa der 'dong bar byed do//yang lha gzhan
195a4(mdo sde): dag rin po che sna bdun gyi rma bya'i gzugs dang ldan zhing /mdongs kyi tshogs kyis khebs pa gang mi'i 'jig rten na'ang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin la lha'i 'jig rten na lha gzhan dang mi
195a5(mdo sde): 'dra ba legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis mngon par brgyan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/de dag gi mdog sdug cing dbyibs legs pa dpe bya bar yang mi nus pa'i steng du zhon no//rnam pa de lta
195a6(mdo sde): budang ldan pa de dag la gzhan dgazhon nas lta na sdug gi skyed mos tshal dang /nye ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/lha'i tshogs de rnams rol mo'i sgra dang /glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyis
195a7(mdo sde): dgod cing rtse la yongasu spyod pa dang /lha gzhan myos shing 'khod pa rnams skyed mos tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do//lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi shing rta bzhi'ang 'khor lo rtsibs stong
195b1(mdo sde): /dang logs par ldan pa/shing rta rin po che sna bdun las byas pa yin te/'di lta ste/an+da rnyil dang /pad+ma rA ga dang /spug shin tu gsal ba dang /bai DUr+ya dang /b+hu ru dang /rdo rje rang shol/
195b2(mdo sde): la gser gyi khye'u rnams kyis mngon par brgyan pa/shing rta'i mchog de la brgya byin zhon nas/rin po che sna bdun gyi bya ngang pa gser gyi pad+ma ltar rgyas shing /dbyibs dang /cha byad sna
195b3(mdo sde): tshogs dang ldan pa sgra che zhing gdangs snyan pa 'byin pa de'i drung na lha mo'i dbyangs kyang snyan pa/mi 'gyur ba stong gis khrid de/brgya byin gyi shing rta rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan bya ngang pa rnams kyis
195b4(mdo sde): khrid par byed do//shing rta de la yang tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bsgyur ba'i 'phyan lnga brgya/'phan shing bai DUr+ya dang /gser dang dngul las byas pa las btags so//'phan gyi kha dog ni
195b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /btsod ka dmar po dang /dkar pos mdzes par byas pa yin la/shing rta de la lha'i rgyal po de zhon nas/lha mo'i tshogs du ma ni nye ba na glu dbyangs len/
195b6(mdo sde): lta 'bum phrag du ma'ang mdun du song nas glu dbyangs len cing na mkha' la ni yang dang yang du 'gro/sa la ni yang dang yang du 'gro ste/gar dga' bar 'gro ba/ci dgar byed pa/lha'i bde ba de nye
195b7(mdo sde): bar spyod cing sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas nyams dga' bzhin du grong khyer lta na sdug dang /skyed mos tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do//der 'dong ba na lha'i tshogs gzhan dag gis mthong
196a1(mdo sde): nas blo byed/gad mo rgod/rtsed mo rtse/rol mo byed cing pad+ma sna tshogs sdong bu bai DUr+ya las byas pa dag lag du khyer nas/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha rnams dang lhan
196a2(mdo sde): cig grang nas mngon du 'ong ba der lta na sdug pa na gnas pa'i lha de rnams kyis kyang skyed mos tshal nas byung nas 'ong ngo //de nas brgya byin gyis bdab cag gis drung 'dir 'ong gis
196a3(mdo sde): khyed kyis 'di dag dang rtse bde bya ba'i rig so zhes kyang bsgo'o//de nas brgya byin gyi kha nas tshig thos pa spyi bos blangs nas/lta ni sdug na gnas pa'i lha ga la ba der chu byung ba'i
196a4(mdo sde): phyir brgyug so//lha mo'i nang nas lha mo de dag kyang blta na sdug pa'i gnas pa'i nang du chu blang ba'i phyir brgyug so//lta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha mo dang /chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha mo dag kyang
196a5(mdo sde): gang de nas phan tshun rgyug go/de ltar lha rnams phan tshun du gser gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag blangs nas skyed mos tshal ga la bai der rgyug la/de dag phan tshun lhan cig tu dgod cing rtse la rgyu'o//
196a6(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin par snang la rgyu zhing 'dug pas kyang lha dang lha mo rnams me tog ku mu daso rtse ba de dag mthong ngo //lha de rnams chu la yun ring du rtse ba de byas nas/de nas yang
196a7(mdo sde): mchog ste/pad+ma la rtse ba rtsom par byed do//lha dang lha mo de dag phan tshun pad+ma la rtse bar byed de/la la gser gyi pad+ma rnams kyis/la la bai DUr+ya dang gser gyi sdong bu rnams kyis/
196b1(mdo sde): la la sdong bu sna tshogs rnams kyis rtse ste de ltar phan tshun rtsed mo byed do//de ltar phan tshun yun ring du bstegs shing rjes nas/'bras bu'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do//de dag gis
196b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu snying blangs nas/phan tshun stag 'bod pa 'phen par byed//'bras bu la rtse ba de'ang byas na chang gi tsha lag la yod bder 'dod par byed//tshal der song nas myos pa'i skyon dang bral zhing
196b3(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa med pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin ro zhim pa las ji ltar byas pa bzhin du zhim pa dag la 'thung bar byed do//lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang shing rta'i mchog de las babs nas lha'i kun
196b4(mdo sde): dga' ra ba gal ba de song ste/de dag gi nang du 'dug go//lha'i rgyal po de rgyal po de rnams kyis mthong nas phan tshun kun yid dga' ste/lha'i rgyal po la mchod pa byed do//
196b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa/bam po sum cu rtsa gnyis pa//de ltar kun gyis thal mo spyi bor sbyar te/mchod pa byas nas/'di ltar lha'i dbang po
196b6(mdo sde): bzhugs pa bdag cag gi srog gi 'bras bu mchis pa lags te/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ni gang bdag cag gi pha ma dag pos lhag par srog stsol ba legs so zhes smras nas/de ltar
196b7(mdo sde): brgya byin de la de rnams kyis legs par mchod do//de nas yang lha de dag la 'di skad ces khyed ni bdag gi bu dang 'dra/spun dang 'dra zhes smras nas/de ltar de dag phan tshun legs par
197a1(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/de nas yang bag med pa'i sar zhugs nas/bag med pa de nyid la gnas so//de nas yang tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dag bya'i tshogs rnams kyi sgra
197a2(mdo sde): 'byin pa/'bab chu dang klung dang tshong tshing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/gser gyi chu bo pad+ma'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal mdzes par byas pa/sa gzhi mnyam zhing 'dzom la mi rtsub pa/mtho
197a3(mdo sde): dman gyis brgyan pa/bai DUr+ya dang gser dang dngul dang shel gyi shing ljon pas brgyan pa/bza' ba dang btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab cing 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa/me tog man+dar
197a4(mdo sde): dang pad+ma la sogs pa me tog chen po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/tshang tshing rnams kyi nang na lha'i bu mo dang bud med rgod rgod/rtse rtse rgal rgal yongasu spyad pas bsten pa'i chang tshing
197a5(mdo sde): gi tshal dang skyed mos tshal rnamasu lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dang lha'i kha zas dang lha'i yul lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis kyang dga' bar byed do//de nas
197a6(mdo sde): yang lta na sdug pa na gnas pa dang chos bzang na gnas pa dga' bar byed pa/rang gi gnas gnas su zhug so//de dag der zhugs nas kyang /ji srid du 'dod pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing
197a7(mdo sde): bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do//de dag phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin/sems can
197b1(mdo sde): dmyal ba dang yi dgas dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/
197b2(mdo sde): las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu shin tu bde bor 'gyur zhing /rig pa'i blo dri ma med pa dang /rol mo la dga' ba ste/bro gar dang glu dbyangs dang rgod pa dang rtse ba la dga'o//rtag tu spro
197b3(mdo sde): ba la dga' zhing bza' ba dang btung ba dang bca' ba dang bza' bar bya ba mang po la dga' ba dang yams kyi nad med cing /rims nad med la mya ngan dang bral bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
197b4(mdo sde): de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed do//de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi
197b5(mdo sde): gnas phyogs gcig na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na//
197b6(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang ldan pa/'byor pa'ong shin tu chung zhing dman par gyur pa gang gis/gzhan dag las nor rdzas kyi rnam pa 'am kha zas dag blangs te/shin tu sdug bsngal yang bu
197b7(mdo sde): dang chung ma 'ba' zhig la mi sbyor bar sems yongasu bsgoms pa'i yid kyis nor rdzas sam/kha zas de dag gzhan sdug bsngal zhing pha rol gzhan dag nyon mongs pa dang long ba dang
198a1(mdo sde): /dbul ba dang mgon med pa rnams la bgo ba shA' byas nas sbyin par byed pa dang srog chags gzhan gyi chung ma la 'khrig pa'i dga' bas rab tu chags pa dag/
198a2(mdo sde): gzhi des mngon par bzung ste/srog bcad pa'i nyon mongs pa 'thob cing go shed ma'i lag tu bskur ba/lho phyogs kyi sgo nas khrid de srog bcad par gyur pa/nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa
198a3(mdo sde): de lta bu'i nang du chung ba las thar bar byas na/de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten phyogs gcig na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro//der skyes nas
198a4(mdo sde): kyang legs par bya ba byas pa/dge ba'i las shin tu rgya che ba byas shing yang dag par spyad pa do//rang gi lus las kun nas 'od 'byung ste/dper na nyi ma'i 'od 'byung ba bzhin no//
198a5(mdo sde): yang 'od de dag gi kha dog sngon po dang ser po dang btsod kha dang ljang khu dang dkar por 'byung ste/lha de'i 'od des lha'i 'jig rten gyi 'od gsal ba de dag thams cad de nas yang
198a6(mdo sde): bcu 'gyur bsdu lhag par gsal bar byed do//dper na gza' dang skur ma'i 'od kyis ji m+bu'i hUM gsal bar byed la/de nas yang zla ba'i 'od kyis gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du/
198a7(mdo sde): do rang gi lus kyi 'od kyis lha'i gnas de dag thams cad brgyan pa bzhin rnam par gsal bar byed do//'od des gzugs phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad dang ljon pa'i lha de la/lha de
198b1(mdo sde): dag gis mngon par brtags te/rnam pa de lta bu khyad par gang gis drung na/lha gzhan de dag srin bu mo khyeb bzhin gsal ba medado//lha'i ris der lha der lha de skyes ma thag tu lha mo de dag thams
198b2(mdo sde): cad lha de ga la ba der rgyug cing skyes ma thag tu rgyan thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te 'di lta ste/gang gi gtsug gi nor bu mthon ka chen po'i 'od kyis dpag tshad dag tu 'od snang bar byed pa bzhin du
198b3(mdo sde): 'od gang gis gzhan mtho ris na gnas pa'i 'od de dag thams cad dang phyi rol gyi nor bu de dag thams cad de ltar zil gyis gnon par byed do//ji ltar nyi ma shar bas srin bu me khyer rnams kyi 'od zel
198b4(mdo sde): gyis gnon par byed pa de bzhin du lha de dag zil gyis gnon par byed do//de nas skyes ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi cod phan dpag tshad brgyar 'od 'phro ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/'od kun gyis
198b5(mdo sde): brgyan cing 'od zer 'byung la gang gis 'od sngon po dang ser po dang btsod kha dang ljang khu dang dkar po dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi mgul rgyan dpag tshad brgyar 'od 'phro ba
198b6(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de ltar de'i 'og tu de rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyun phrang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu phreng ba 'chang ba rdo rjes brgyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu de'i rkang pa'i phreng rgyan ji

199a1(mdo sde): de ltar 'gro ba ni/gang gi tshe lha de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag che ge mo zhag tu na mkha' las 'gro'o snyam du bsams na sems bskyed ma thag tu lha yul du 'byung ba'i lham

199a5(mdo sde): de'adir nye bar spyod par 'gyur te/de dag gis logs par byas pa'i las kyi rgyu ngas bdag 'dir skyes te/rgyu med pas ni ma yin snyam mo//de de ltar bsams pa dang thang cig tu lha mo gzugs
199a6(mdo sde): dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa ji snyed pa thams cad nyid nye bar 'ong bar byed de/de dag gi rgyan gyi sgra ji ltar mi yul na sil snyan yan lag lnga dang shin tu ldan pa de dag gi sgra 'byung ba

205a2(mdo sde): rta sna tshogs su skyes par 'gyur ba'i las rnam pa gnyis pa yin no//tshal gyi rgyu dpag tshad sum stong yod pa de na/lha dag shing rta sna tshogs rnams kyis dga' bar byed de/des na shing rta sna tshogs
205a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ming du btags la/shing rta sna tshogs der gnas pa'i lha rnams rtse bar byed do//shing rta dang shing rta'i nang na gser dang dngul gyi pad+ma bai DUr+ya shin tu lta na sdug pa dri mchog tu yid du
205a4(mdo sde): 'thad pa'i rdzing 'byung la/bung ba bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bu'i tshogs lding ba rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin no//tshal der bkra ba 'di dag kun 'byung bar 'gyur te de brjod pa/
205a5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i rdzing rnamasu pad+ma bkra ba 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/pad+ma la la pad+ma'i phyed mthon ka las byas pa/phyed bai DUr+ya las byas pa yin te bkra ba gcig yin no//yang bkra ba gzhan ni phyed bai DUr+ya
205a6(mdo sde): las byas la phyed gser las byas pa yin te bkra ba gzhan yino//yang bkra ba gzhan ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa thams cad kyi pad+ma la pad+ma phyed kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma ni gser las byas la gzhan
205a7(mdo sde): ni pad+ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu yi no//yang bkra ba gzhan 'byung ba ni/pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i 'dab ma dag la bung ba gser gyi mdog can rgyu la/dngul gyi 'dab ma dag la bung ba pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can
205b1(mdo sde): rgyu'o//yang bkra ba gzhan 'byung ba ni bai DUr+ya'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la ni gser gyis yongasu dkris/gasngar gyi pad+ma'i sdong bu la ni rin po ches yongasu dkris/dngul gyi pad+ma'i sdong bu la ni smug gis
205b2(mdo sde): yongasu dkris/rin po che mdzod kyi kha dog lta bu'i sdong bu la ni dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyis yongs su dkris so//bung ba sgra 'byin pa kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa rnams kyis pad+ma'i rting bu de
205b3(mdo sde): dag khebs pa yin te 'di lta ste/dzam+bu'i gling na me tog tsu la sa'i reg pa la bung ba rnams kyis rtag tu khebs pa ltar shing rta sna tshogs kyi'ang de dang 'dra'o//de nas legs par byas pa'i las
205b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis gnas sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur te 'di lta ste/dzam+bu'i gling na lag bzo mkhas pa 'am lag bzo'i slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis brtsig ngos la bkra ba 'dab ma sna tshogs bkod pa/
205b5(mdo sde): chen rtsi sna tshogs kyis bris pa ltar/tshal gyi gnas de na'ang de lta bu yin no//yang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal gyi bkra ba gzhan ni bya sna tshogs kyi sgro dang rkang pa dang mgo dang lto dang mig bkra ba
205b6(mdo sde): dag 'byung ste 'di lta ste/bya gang gi lto gser du 'dug pa de'i sgra dngul yin la/nub pad+ma rA ga'i mdog dang mig rin po che ke ga ru'i mdog/de bzhin du gang dngul gyi ltor 'dug pa de'i sgro gser
205b7(mdo sde): la mig bai DUr+ya'i mdog dang mig gi 'bras bu pad+ma rA ga'i mdog le rgyab bkra bar 'dug ste/rin po che sgra/bdun gyi mdog lta bu'i bya sna tshogs rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so//'di ni shing rta
206a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi tshal gyi bkra ba gzhan yin te 'di lta ste/ri'i rtse mo 'byung ba dang 'di lta ste/mthon ka dang /bai DUr+ya dang /spug dang rin po che kle ke ru dang gser te/de rnams
206a2(mdo sde): kyi 'od kyis tshal de spras shing brgyan pa yino//tshal de phan tshun gyi 'od zer 'khyil bas shin tu gang la/lha'i 'od zer gyi mthus shin tu mdzes par byas pa yin no//yang tshal sna tshogs
206a3(mdo sde): bkra ba gzhan ni lcug ma 'phyang ba dang shing gel ba sna tshogs dag phan tshun 'dzings par 'dug la/kha dog gsum 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/bai DUr+ya'i lcug ma la pad+ma rA ga'i mdog gi 'bras bu
206a4(mdo sde): de 'phyang bar 'gyur zhing /an+da rnyil gyi mdog lta bus lhan cig dkris pa yin/dngul gyi lcug ma la pad+ma rA ga'i mdog gi 'od kyis lhan cig bskor ba yin/de bzhin du spug dang gser
206a5(mdo sde): gyi lcug ma la gser gyi lcug mas lhan cig dkris pa yin 'di lta ste/rin po che ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu'i lcug ma la dngul gyis yongasu dkris pa yin te/de ltar lcug ma kha dog gnyis
206a6(mdo sde): pa 'phyang ba yongasu dkris pa yin no//lcug ma 'phyang ba kha dog gsum pa rnams la yongasu dkris pa ni 'odi lta ste/bai DUr+ya'i lcug ma la gser dang ko ke ru'i mdog lta bus kun tu dkris
206a7(mdo sde): pa yin/de bzhin du lcug ma ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu la gser dang dngul lta bus yongasu dkris pa yin/de bzhin du dngul gyi lcug ma la pad+ma spug dang mthon ka lta bus yongs su
206b1(mdo sde): dkris pa yin te/de ltar lcug ma re re la gnyis gnyis kyis kun tu kris pa min no//yang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal tu bkra ba gzhan 'byung ba ni gser gyi lcug ma dag las me tog bai DUr+ya'o
206b2(mdo sde): mdog lta bu 'byung /de bzhin du dngul gyi lcug ma dag las me tog mthon ka'i mdog lta bu 'byung /de bzhin du gser gyi lcug ma dag las me tog ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu 'byung //de bzhin
206b3(mdo sde): du sdug gi lcug ma dag las me tog bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bu 'byung ste/de ltar lcug ma sna tshogs dag las me tog sna tshogs dag 'byung ngo //las sna tshogs kyis bskyed pa sems sna tshogs
206b4(mdo sde): kyis bslang ba rgyu sna tshogs dang mthun pa ni yang dag par skyes pa sna tshogs dge yin te/de ltar las rnams kyi rgyu dang gzhi des de ltar shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal thams cad bkra ba yin no//
206b5(mdo sde): ji ltar sa boni las 'bras bu 'byung ba de bzhin du rgyu dang mthun par 'bras bu 'byung ste/gang 'dir las byed pa rnam pa gang ji ltar 'phongs pa dang gang gi tshe zhing gi rnam pa ji lta bu dang
206b6(mdo sde): sems pa'i rnam pa ji lta bu nas/sna tshogs su slong bar byed pa'i bar gyi las rnam pa sna tshogasu slong bar byed pa'i bar gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa'i 'bras bu ni de ltar rgya'i
206b7(mdo sde): 'bur lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mtho ris sam sems can dmyal ba gang rgyu med par 'bras bu 'byung ba de med de gzhan gyis byas la rnam par smin pa gzhan la 'byung /de ni
207a1(mdo sde): /gnas med do//de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal bkra ba dang 'jig rten bkra ba la'ang rtog par
207a2(mdo sde): byed de/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i shing rta sna tshogs na lha rnams las ci zhig byed cig pu snyam nas/des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/'di ltar dus gang gi tshe//
207a3(mdo sde): mi chos dang mi ldan pa chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa mar mi 'dzin pa/phar mi 'dzin pa/dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/bram zer mi 'dzin pa/rigs kyi rgan rabs la gus
207a4(mdo sde): par mi byed pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen du mi 'dzin pa/las dang 'bras bu la yid mi ches pa/yang dag pa'i lta bo med pa/yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sngon du 'gro ba med pa'i tshe/bdud sdig can
207a5(mdo sde): dag dga' bar 'gyur la/de'i chos dang chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'khor bzhi po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te 'di lta ste/bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba 'thab zhes bya ba dang bdud kyi
207a6(mdo sde): ris 'jig rten skyong ba g.yeng byed ces bya ba gang chos spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems g.yeng bar byed pa 'am dam pa'i chos nyan pa gnyid log par byed pa dang gsum pa lhag par
207a7(mdo sde): chags par rmongs pa zhes bya ba sbyin bdag gtong ba na/sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag rnams kyi sems chags pa skyed par byed de/'di ltar bdag gis gang dge sbyong dang bram ze zhing du gyur pa
207b1(mdo sde): rnams la sbyin du bdag glo bu dang chung ma ci bza' ci bgo snyam du sems par byed de/bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba gsum pa dag sems can rnams rnam par rmongs par byed cing 'jog rten na rgyu bar/
207b2(mdo sde): byed do//bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi pa 'du shes log pa zhes bya ba de 'jig rten na rgyu zhing de rab tu 'byung ba rnams kyi sems rab tu mi 'byung bar 'gyuraro//dang po ni chags pa dang rtso
207b3(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang tshong zong nyo tshong byed pa dang bud med la lta 'dod pa dang chang 'tshong gi khyim du 'jug pa dang 'thab rtsod dang dge 'dun 'byed pa dang rmi lam gyi gnod pa'i sems skyed par byed do//bdud kyi
207b4(mdo sde): ris 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po de dag gang gi tshe chos dang mi ldan pa'i skye dgu dzam+bu gling du byed pa nus pa dang ldan pa 'byung ba de'i tshe/bdud sdig can dag la lha dag dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'grib
207b5(mdo sde): bo//bdud kyi phyogs ni 'phel te dgyes par mdzod cig ces bsnyad do//de dag las thos nas bdud sdig can dag gi rje su 'bra spade dag la bdag cag gi phyogs ji ltar 'phel/dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs
207b6(mdo sde): ji ltar 'gribs shes dris so//de dag gis lho'i dzam+bu gling na mi chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa chos ma yin pa'i rjesu 'jug pa mar mi 'dzin pa par mi 'dzin pa dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa bram zer mi 'dzin
207b7(mdo sde): pa rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su mi 'dzin pa bdag cag gi 'dod chags kyi chags pas zil gyis mnan cing dam pa'i chos nyan pa la'ang gnod par bgyid do//de nas rab tu 'byung ba'i blos phal cher
208a1(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba rnams dang khyim na gnas pa sdom pa drangs nang rdungs par spyod pa rnams kyi tsho lam du'ang bung mod kyi gzugs sprul nas rmi lam gyi gnod pa bgyid du stsal/
208a2(mdo sde): sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag rnams kyi sbyin pa gtong ba na bu dang chung ma la rag las pa'i sems kyis yid chags par gyur pa bgyis/yid mdzu'i bo dang 'khrugs par bgyis//rab gyi
208a3(mdo sde): po'ang nye tshong go zong la sems brtson par bgyis/'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang 'chang 'drud pa dang dga' bar bgyis te/de ltar bdag cag gi thabs 'di rnams kyis bdud kyi phyogs ni sprul
208a4(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni bshig go zhes smraso//bdud sdig can gyis de thos nas/l+h+wa ma yin sgra gtsun dang brtan pa dang rAba~M dgod dang gzhan dag dang gyu rab 'jom la sogs pa dag la 'di
208a5(mdo sde): ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni yongasu rmas so//bdag cig gi phyogs ni 'phel te/khyed dga' bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o//de ltar yang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag nyid yang sa'i 'og tu
208a6(mdo sde): gtong bar byed de/sa'i 'og tu song nas/rab dgod dang thag zangs ris la snga ma bzhin du bsnyad do//dathos nas lha ma yin rnams rab tu dga' ste/klu rab 'jom la sogs pa chos
208a7(mdo sde): dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjesu mi 'jug pa rnams la bsnyad do//longs spyod ldan na gnas pa'i klu de rnams kyis thos nas kyang shin tu dga' ste/de dag mi rnams la snga ma bzhin du bgags
208b1(mdo sde): byed do//de dag kyang 'phags skyes po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba gzhan dag las de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du thos nas/lha'i rgyalnga po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan can
208b2(mdo sde): shing rje sna tshigs kyi tshal du 'jug par byed do//de zhugs nas lho rnams zas te/'di ltar 'jig rten skyong ba 'di dag ni re/'di ltar bdud kyi ris kyi lho rnam sa rab tu mthu dang ldan pa yin te/
208b3(mdo sde): yin thag zangs ris par ba dgod la sogs pa dang klu rab 'jom la sogs pa mthu rab tu che'o zhes zor gyis/de la lha khyed cag gis lha'i tshogs thams cad 'dir bsdu bar rig so//'dus nas kyang bdag cag
208b4(mdo sde): lha'i tshogs thams cad lha ma yin dang g.yul spad pa'i phyir rin po ches brgyan pa'i brtsegs pa sna tshog su 'dong ngo //de thos nas lha thams cad kyis de ltar 'tshal zhes smras nas rang gi gnas ga la ba de
208b5(mdo sde): 'dong ngo //dong nas lha gzhan thams cad bsdus nas/mdor bsdus te/shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal ga la ba der 'dong ngo //dong nas skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs kyi gnas nyid du 'khod cing sil snyan sgra
208b6(mdo sde): dbyangs sna tshogs dang klu dag len pa na/shing rta sna tshogs kyis bkra ba rnamasu dga' bar byed do//gang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tsha lo na rtag pa rtag pa nyid du 'khod pa'i lha de dag ni skyed mos tshal gar yang
208b7(mdo sde): mi 'gro'o//de nas lha'i dbang po des la de dag bsdus nas shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal de nas dong ngo //shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha de dag kyang ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba
209a1(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do//de zad nas lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/shi nas kyang nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba
209a2(mdo sde): bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang yi dgas dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//gal ta ma rnams kyi nang du skyes na/las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /mchod
209a3(mdo sde): bog ma nas 'chi ba'i bar du me tog gi phreng ba sdug gu thogs shing cha byed snacog da shi ha sna rdzogs lada' ba myo kun dga' bor 'gyur/gal ta dA rab tu byung na de seng ge'i khre la 'dug nas chas
209a4(mdo sde): dang gtam sna tshogs smra ba dang gtam sna tshogs kyis 'khor kyang kun nas shin tu dga' bar byed pa mthong ngo //de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/sum
209a5(mdo sde): curtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas dga' ba na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa
209a6(mdo sde): mthong ngo //der sems can dag las gang gis skyo bar 'gyur snyam nas/de zos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags ni/skyes bu dam pa bsam pa dge bar gyur pa gang gis srog
209a7(mdo sde): gcod pa mi byed cing ma byin par len pa'ang mi byed la/byed du ma bcug/pha rol byed pa'ang bzlog/bdag nyid mi byed/byed du ma bcug/byas na'ang 'chags par byed cing skyon du bgrang bar
209b1(mdo sde): byed la sdig pa'i grogs bo de yongasu sbyong bar byed do//de la srog gcod pa dang bral ba ni gang yin rnam pa ni du yod cig gu snyam nas/'di ni bya ne'u bzung bar thar bar byed cing sdom pa lan du//
209b2(mdo sde): bcug nas bdag nyid mi byed la so sor 'chags par byed pa 'am/bya bas bya bzung ba nor rdzas kyis brus te thar par byed la gzhan yang dri nyid la rab tu 'jog par byed/rab tu dga' rje
209b3(mdo sde): byed/rab tu spro bar byed pa dang ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin/ma byin par len pa spangs pa gang yin zhig gu snyam na/'dir sdud pa por gyur nas grong rnams 'dzin tem tsha
209b4(mdo sde): lho grong rdal lam phyogs kyi lhas 'dzin pa 'am rgyal pos 'di ltar lug dang ba lang dang bong bu la sogs pa bsdus shig ces bsgo ba las/de'ang sdom pa'i 'jigs pas skrag nas ma
209b5(mdo sde): byin par len pa mi byed na/de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang dga' ba'i tshal du skye bar 'gyu ro//las gzhan gyis kyang
209b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/chos nyan pa'ang chos nyan pa po rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshes grangs dang yul dang dus dang ldan par byas la de dag kyang dbye'o bar byas te/de dag yid rab tu dga' ba
209b7(mdo sde): sems rtse gcig gis chos nyan na/dam pa'i chos nyan pa'i slob dpon de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dga' ba'i tshal du skye bar 'gyur ro//sbyin pa thams
210a1(mdo sde): kyi nang na sbyin pa'i mchog 'di yin te 'di lta ste/chos sbyin pa zhes bya'o//rgyu 'dis kyang lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i/
210a2(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi nang na dga' ba'i tshal du skye bar 'gyur ro//der skyes nas kyang de lha'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dpe med pa brgya phrag stong du ma myong ba na/'di ltar gang du tshal de'i phyogs kyi cha
210a3(mdo sde): ni 'di yin te/dpag tshad sum stong yod la rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin te/de ltar lha rnams rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gzhan gar yang
210a4(mdo sde): mi 'gro ste/de bas na lhan cig skyes pa'i yon tan gyis de dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o//de nas shing ljon pa thams cad 'dod pa dag gang lha rnams kyi yid kyis yang dag par sems par byed
210a5(mdo sde): pa de dag nyid lha de rnams kyis shing ljon pa las 'thob par 'gyur te/de ltar lho rnams kyi yid la bdag khyim zhig 'dod do snyam na/de nas de ltar lha des yid la byas ma thag tu shing ljon
210a6(mdo sde): pa de'i yal ga'i rtse mo la 'byung bar 'gyur te/shing ljon pa de'i khang bzang rin po che sna bdun dang ldan zhing nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ka ba stong yod pa'i khang bzang mthong bar 'gyuraro//
210a7(mdo sde): khang pa de'i ka ba so sor de'i phyogs phyogs bai DUr+ya las byas shing /la la gser las byas/la la shel las byas/la la kau ke ru las byas/la la spug las byas pa yin no//de nas
210b1(mdo sde): khyim gyi mchog de la shing ljon pa'i rtse mo de la yod/mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/'ad ni bdag lam 'jam zhing mtho dma' ru 'gyur ba nas/khyim 'drir 'jug par bya'o snyam bsdams
210b2(mdo sde): mo brag nyid du shing ljon pa de nyid lam mthong ste drer 'jug par byed do//de ltar lam de nyid nas zhugs pa dang de 'di snyam du sems te/da ni bdag gi khyim 'dir khyim nang dro pad+ma'i N+DI ba zhig
210b3(mdo sde): yod na rung dri snyam mo//de sems bskyed ma thug nyid du pad+ma'i rdzing rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/bya ngang ba dang ka ran ba dang dur ba sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i byung ngo //de nas
210b4(mdo sde): yang lha de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi sil snyan dang glu dbyangs yan lag lnga dang ljon pa 'byung bar gyur cig snyam mo//de sems bskyed ma thag nyid du gang rlung dang 'jam pa rab tu ltung bar
210b5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/rnam pa ji srid du phan tshun rig pa na sgra 'byung ba'i rnam pa de srid du sil spyan yin lag lnga dang ldan pa 'byung ngo //lha de 'di snyam du sems te/shing ljon po'i nang gi khang byar de ni bathal
210b6(mdo sde): ba dang bdud ba chu bo ltar 'byeb par gyur cig snum mo//de sems bskyod mi thag nyid du shing ljon pa'i yal ga de dag rdol nas bza' bo chu ba snyed dang btung ba chu bo snyed kha dogu dang ro dang reg pa
210b7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo //de 'di snyam du sems te da ni bdag bdud rtsi bza' bar bya'o snyam mo//de sems bskyed ma thag nyid du bdud rtsi lha'i ro dang dri dang mdog phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ste
211a1(mdo sde): de de la za bar byed do//de des shin tu tshim pa dang de nas yang lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed yongasu spyod par byed do//de ltar dga' ba'i tshal du lha dag shing gi drung /
211a2(mdo sde): du song ste bde ba nye bar spyod par byed do//de gal te yang shing ljon pa'i mchog de la 'babs par byed do//de sa'i steng du song nas de lo 'chag par byed do//de 'chag pa na bai DUr+ya'i sdong bu dang ldan
211a3(mdo sde): pa'i pad+ma'i gser gyi 'dab ma mtho ris su 'os pa/'jam zhing 'phar ba kun nas mchog tu nyams dga' zhing shin tu dri zhim be dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/de dag la rkang pas 'gro zhing lha de
211a4(mdo sde): 'chag par byed la/lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs len pa/de ltar lha de rkang pas 'chag pa'i bde ba nye bar myong ngo //de rnam par rtog pa 'bum snyed du ma dag 'grub zhing
211a5(mdo sde): bde ba myong ste dbang po lnga rnams kyi yul lnga rnams la myong bar byed do//dbang po kun rang gi yul gyis tshim pa med par 'gyur te 'di lta ste/mig gis gzugs gang mthong ba de dag zlos pa
